alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Chouteau; Fergus; Hill; Judith Basin; Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 7:22PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong cold front will impact portions of Judith Basin, Liberty, western Fergus, Hill, Chouteau and eastern Cascade Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 719 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cold front along a line extending from 33 miles northeast of Sunburst to 24 miles southeast of Cascade. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, associated with the immediate passage of the cold front. Winds should decrease somewhat over the following hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Havre, Fort Benton, Chester, Big Sandy, Stanford, Belt, Geraldine, Denton, Hobson, Parker School, Joplin, Highwood, Azure, Inverness, Black Eagle, Geyser, Beaver Creek, Lothair and The Knees. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 0 and 66. Highway 2 between mile markers 308 and 382. Highway 87 between mile markers 4 and 111. Highway 89 between mile markers 38 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cascade; Chouteau; Fergus; Hill; Judith Basin; Liberty
